author: Delpech, Estelle and Candillier, Laurent
title: Nomao : un moteur de recherche géolocalisé spécialisé dans la recommandation de lieux et l'e-réputation (Nomao : a geolocalized search engine dedicated to place recommendation and e-reputation) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 5: Software Demonstrations
